0011000101011001 1100010011001110 1 -> sum: 1111011000101000, cout: 0
1100110000111000 0011011001111000 1 -> sum: 0000001010110001, cout: 1
0011011111110000 1100001111010000 1 -> sum: 1111101111000001, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
